comments.content: Why they didn’t use the [Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010130617/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.6735.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=gHaneal&sampleSize=48) is beyond me... :-/

You truly are the troublesolverman...

Thanks pal
